pr_title: [STORM-3708] Add TopologyID to log messages in ConstraintSolverConfig

timeline.message: [STORM-3708] Add topoId to log messages in ConstraintSolverConfig

timeline.bodyText: Why are we changing this in this PR?
timeline.author: Ethanlm

replies.bodyText: This test for ConstraintSolverStrategy is different internally.
replies.author: bipinprasad

replies.bodyText: I noticed this was changed in the acker distribution PR #3346. I would remove this from this PR since it is irrelevant. It will be easier to understand the change when we look back the history in the future. Thanks
replies.author: Ethanlm
